title: 088 - A Touching Ode To Movie Theaters... Goodbye
description: On today's show, the boys give a touching tribute to movie theaters as they fully accept the fact that they are dead. Plus the guys discuss Mitt not washing his hands after taking a dump, a very very old sarcophagus being opening in Egypt, actors that Tony commonly mixes up, the right amount of booze to ingest at a wedding with an open bar, Zito gives out a couple of history lessons, and Tony pleads with the people to not give up on 2020 yet as he is still a big Roaring 20's guy, plus much much more from a LOADED Pod FOD. Don't forget to subscribe to youtube.com/thepatmcafeeshow for your chance to win a piece of $100,000 as a part of our 1 million subscriber giveaway, and keep sending your submissions into the Pod FOD @ThePodPMI on Twitter and Instagram. We appreciate you all for listening, enjoy, and we'll see you Friday.
dc:creator: The Pod
